thread.title: The Nuclear Option: At Sessions’ Hearing, Dems Live Up to the Party’s Tradition of Racism
thread.title_full: The Nuclear Option: At Sessions’ Hearing, Dems Live Up to the Party’s Tradition of Racism

author: Charles Hurt
title: The Nuclear Option: At Sessions’ Hearing, Dems Live Up to the Party’s Tradition of Racism
text: Like tired old racists clinging to their discredited past and divisive politics, Democrats wheezed exhaustively on their racial dog whistles Tuesday in their increasingly futile bid to derail Sen. Jeff Sessions’ nomination to become the next attorney general.
